CONFIRM_EXIT_GAMEPLAY: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be lost.
CONFIRM_EXIT_AFTERMATH: Are you sure you want to leave? You can't return to the game.
CONFIRM_EXIT_SETUP: Are you sure? You'll need to restart the setup process.
BUDGET_SYSTEM_DESC: Show budget UI and apply costs to decisions.
DILEMMAS_SUBJECT_DESC: Gate events to a theme (default off).
DATA_COLLECTION_DESC: Help improve the game by sharing anonymous gameplay data (default off)
EXPERIMENT_MODE_DESC: Enable experimental features outside the normal flow.
EXPERIMENT_ROLE_LOCKED: Finish the previous scenario to unlock this role.
EXPERIMENT_ALL_ROLES_COMPLETE: Thank you for participating! You've finished trying all experiment roles.
ID_COLLECTION_DESC: Use your official @tau.ac.il student email address to join the simulation. We‚Äôll use it only to verify participation.
ID_COLLECTION_REQUIREMENT: Only university addresses that end with @tau.ac.il are accepted, and the part before @ must contain at least three different characters. Please double-check for typos before continuing.
ID_COLLECTION_CONSENT: By providing your email, you agree to participate in this experiment. All data is collected for research purposes only, and no personal information is retained after processing.
ID_COLLECTION_WARNING: Providing an incorrect email may result in no course credit being awarded for this task.
ID_VALIDATION_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
ID_VALIDATION_LOCAL_LENGTH: Email username must include at least three letters or digits before the @ symbol.
ID_VALIDATION_LOCAL_VARIETY: Email username must contain at least three different characters before the @ symbol.
INTRO_LIFE_BRANCHING: Life is a branching journey where every choice reflects yourself and leads to a different outcome.
INTRO_MAZE_POLITICS: In aMaze'n Politics you travel a constantly shifting maze, where private choices intersect with public life.
INTRO_MAZE_POLITICS_MALE: In aMaze'n Politics you travel a constantly shifting maze, where private choices intersect with public life.
INTRO_MAZE_POLITICS_FEMALE: In aMaze'n Politics you travel a constantly shifting maze, where private choices intersect with public life.
CITIZEN_ASSEMBLY_ATHENS: Citizen of the Assembly in Classical Athens
SUGGEST_ROLE_DESC: Write a role and a setting. For example: "Mars colony leader in distant future" or "Partisan leader in World War II."
SUGGEST_ROLE_PLACEHOLDER: Type a role and a setting (partisan leader in World War II, Mars colony leader in distant future etc.)
AI_CONNECTION_ERROR: We can't reach the AI service right now. Check your connection or API key and try again.
AI_NICE_ROLE: Nice! That's a clear role and setting.
AI_FALLBACK_1: That sounds like a vibe, not a role *with* a setting. Try "navigator in a Bronze Age fleet".
AI_FALLBACK_2: Close! Give a role **and** a setting. e.g., "city treasurer in Renaissance Florence".
AI_FALLBACK_3: Almost. Add a where/when: "cybernetics minister on Luna, 2199".
GENERATING_CHARACTER: Generating a character you can edit‚Ä¶
LOADING_QUOTE_1: Deciding whether your name should strike fear‚Ä¶ or just mild confusion.
LOADING_QUOTE_2: Polishing your future autobiography's opening line.
LOADING_QUOTE_3: Rolling dice to determine how photogenic your campaign portraits will be.
LOADING_QUOTE_4: Giving you a name history teachers will definitely mispronounce.
LOADING_QUOTE_5: Assigning you a birthplace that looks great on bumper stickers.
LOADING_QUOTE_6: Checking if your haircut is constitutionally appropriate.
LOADING_QUOTE_7: Balancing your charisma score against your ability to remember names.
LOADING_QUOTE_8: Selecting the font your name will appear in on scandalous headlines.
LOADING_QUOTE_9: Installing the dramatic pause before your full title is announced.
LOADING_QUOTE_10: Making sure your initials don't spell something embarrassing.
DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Description (mention any facial features and accessories you want present):
DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: with a dignified expression, long black hair tied in a topknot, a finely groomed beard‚Ä¶
DIFFICULTY_DESC: Select the challenge level that suits your ambition
GOALS_SELECTION_DESC: Select exactly 2 out of 3 goals to pursue during your rule
DEBUG_SKIP_TO_FINAL: Debug: Skip to final day with random choice
ATHENS_FLAVOR: Feel equal among your peers as you shape the destiny of the city.
ROME_FLAVOR: Balance ambition and duty in the crowded halls of the Republic.
CHINA_FLAVOR: Wield the absolute power of the Dragon Throne.
GERMANY_FLAVOR: Navigate compromise and power in a modern democracy.
ATHENS_INTRO: Sparta threatens war. 40,000 Athenians shout in the Assembly‚Äîabandon the farms, fortify the walls, or strike first? You're one voice among thousands. You can propose. You can argue. You cannot command. The demos decides.
ATHENS_YOU_ARE: a citizen of Athens, standing in the Assembly, your voice one among thousands shaping the city's destiny
ATHENS_YOU_ARE_MALE: a citizen of Athens, standing in the Assembly, your voice one among thousands shaping the city's destiny
ATHENS_YOU_ARE_FEMALE: a citizen of Athens, standing in the Assembly, your voice one among thousands shaping the city's destiny
ALEXANDRIA_INTRO: Caesar hunts Pompey through your city while the Great Library burns. You're a scholar caught between generals, queens, and flames. Cleopatra needs allies. Caesar needs guides. The scrolls need saving. Choose fast.
ALEXANDRIA_YOU_ARE: a scholar and advisor caught between Caesar, Cleopatra, and the flames
FLORENCE_TITLE: Florence ‚Äî The Fire and the Faith
FLORENCE_INTRO: The Medici fled. Friar Savonarola burns art in the streets. You sit on the city council, caught between pious fervor and Renaissance splendor. Half the city follows the friar. Half mourns what's burning.
FLORENCE_YOU_ARE: a council member torn between faith and freedom
NORTH_AMERICA_INTRO: English settlers built Jamestown on your people's land. They bring tools, disease, and hunger for territory. You're the tribal chief watching the future arrive in wooden ships. You can trade, fight, or negotiate‚Äîbut not ignore them.
NORTH_AMERICA_YOU_ARE: a tribal chief facing the first English colony on your land
JAPAN_TITLE: Japan ‚Äî The Land at War's End
JAPAN_INTRO: Civil war ends at Sekigahara in weeks. Tokugawa and Ishida prepare to clash. Your clan is small, vulnerable, and must choose sides. Pledge loyalty or face annihilation. Neutrality will be crushed.
JAPAN_YOU_ARE: the leader of a small clan forced to choose a side before the battle of Sekigahara
HAITI_INTRO: Enslaved Africans rose up and set the colony ablaze. You're a mixed-race overseer‚Äîtoo dark for the planters' trust, too compromised for the rebels' mercy. The old world burns. The new one is born in blood.
HAITI_YOU_ARE: a mixed-race overseer trapped between the masters and the rebels
RUSSIA_INTRO: The Great War bleeds Russia dry. Bread riots erupt. The Duma demands reform while Bolsheviks whisper revolution. You're the Tsar, and the throne cracks beneath you. Crush dissent, grant reforms, or abdicate‚Äîchoose quickly.
RUSSIA_YOU_ARE: the Tsar forced to choose between reform, repression, or surrendering your crown
INDIA_INTRO: British rule ends at midnight. Partition tears the subcontinent apart, and trains arrive filled with corpses. You're a district officer keeping Hindus and Muslims from slaughtering each other as two nations are born in blood.
INDIA_YOU_ARE: a district officer trying to keep the peace while your town tears itself apart along communal lines
SOUTH_AFRICA_TITLE: South Africa ‚Äî The End of Apartheid
SOUTH_AFRICA_INTRO: Mandela walks free, and the apartheid state you served is crumbling. You're a senior police commander ordered to keep peace while the world watches. The cameras roll. The crowds rage. What comes next starts now.
SOUTH_AFRICA_YOU_ARE: a senior police commander ordered to keep order during the end of apartheid
MARS_INTRO: Your colony declared independence. Earth cut the supply lines. The engineers are nervous, corporate sponsors are watching, and you're the elected governor balancing dreams of freedom against survival math. Starvation or surrender‚Äîboth are one shipment away.
MARS_YOU_ARE: the elected leader of the first Mars colony balancing survival, freedom, and Earth's control
ACHIEVEMENTS_INFO: Achievements are currently under development. In future updates, you'll be able to unlock these by completing specific challenges during gameplay. Check back soon!
HIGHSCORE_SUBTITLE_GLOBAL: Top scores from players worldwide (best score per player)
HIGHSCORE_NO_LOCAL_SCORES: No scores yet. Complete a game to see your scores here!
HIGHSCORE_ERROR_LOAD: Failed to load scores. Please try again.
LEADER_DESC_NELSON_MANDELA: South Africa's peacemaker-president who transformed long imprisonment into reconciliation and a shared democratic project
LEADER_DESC_MAHATMA_GANDHI: India's spiritual-political leader who led independence through nonviolent resistance and civil disobedience
LEADER_DESC_GEORGE_WASHINGTON: America's first president who set precedents for peaceful power transfer and republican virtue
LEADER_DESC_ABRAHAM_LINCOLN: Preserved the Union through civil war, ended slavery, and redefined American democracy
LEADER_DESC_ANGELA_MERKEL: Germany's pragmatic chancellor who steered Europe through crises with steady, consensus-driven leadership
LEADER_DESC_ASHOKA: Mauryan ruler in India who turned from conquest to compassion, spreading Buddhist ethics and public welfare across the realm
LEADER_DESC_LAFA_KEMAL_ATATRK: Founded modern Turkey from Ottoman ruins, imposing secular reforms and Western-style nationalism
LEADER_DESC_FRANKLIN_D_ROOSEVELT: Led America through Depression and World War II, expanding federal power and social welfare
LEADER_DESC_ELIZABETH_I: England's shrewd queen who balanced religious factions, defeated Spain, and launched an age of exploration and culture
LEADER_DESC_WINSTON_CHURCHILL: Britain's wartime prime minister whose defiant leadership rallied the free world against Nazi Germany
QUIZ_TOWN_STATUE_Q: You've been asked to build a statue in the town square. What should it represent?
QUIZ_TOWN_STATUE_Q_MALE: You've been asked to build a statue in the town square. What should it represent?
QUIZ_TOWN_STATUE_Q_FEMALE: You've been asked to build a statue in the town square. What should it represent?
QUIZ_TOWN_STATUE_A1: A hero holding the scales of justice
QUIZ_TOWN_STATUE_A3: A wise elder pointing to the stars
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_Q: Suppose you find a shiny button in the middle of the park. Pressing it might reveal the deepest secret of the universe, or it might just turn on the sprinklers. Do you press it?
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_Q_MALE: Suppose you find a shiny button in the middle of the park. Pressing it might reveal the deepest secret of the universe, or it might just turn on the sprinklers. Do you press it?
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_Q_FEMALE: Suppose you find a shiny button in the middle of the park. Pressing it might reveal the deepest secret of the universe, or it might just turn on the sprinklers. Do you press it?
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_A1: Yes, truth at any cost ‚Äî secrets must be uncovered
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_A2: No, let's keep the mystery alive ‚Äî life is funnier that way
QUIZ_BUTTON_IN_PARK_A3: Only if I can first form a proper committee and write a report
QUIZ_ISLAND_DECORATION_Q: You're on a deserted island, and you can decorate your shelter with either a sturdy lock, a colorful mural, or a bookshelf of old dusty rules. Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ISLAND_DECORATION_Q_MALE: You're on a deserted island, and you can decorate your shelter with either a sturdy lock, a colorful mural, or a bookshelf of old dusty rules. Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ISLAND_DECORATION_Q_FEMALE: You're on a deserted island, and you can decorate your shelter with either a sturdy lock, a colorful mural, or a bookshelf of old dusty rules. Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ISLAND_DECORATION_A2: The mural ‚Äî art is life, even if crabs don't appreciate it
QUIZ_ISLAND_DECORATION_A3: The rules ‚Äî tradition keeps even coconuts in line
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_Q: Imagine you're given the power to instantly start one worldwide festival. What do people celebrate?
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_Q_MALE: Imagine you're given the power to instantly start one worldwide festival. What do people celebrate?
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_Q_FEMALE: Imagine you're given the power to instantly start one worldwide festival. What do people celebrate?
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_A1: A Festival of Fairness ‚Äî free pie slices for everyone
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_A2: A Festival of Freedom ‚Äî everyone does what they want, preferably loudly
QUIZ_WORLDWIDE_FESTIVAL_A3: A Festival of Faith ‚Äî songs, rituals, and a little awe
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_Q: At midnight you see a red traffic light, but not a single soul around. What do you do?
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_Q_MALE: At midnight you see a red traffic light, but not a single soul around. What do you do?
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_Q_FEMALE: At midnight you see a red traffic light, but not a single soul around. What do you do?
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_A1: Stop. Even rules deserve respect when no one is watching
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_A2: Go! Why wait for a robot lamp to tell me how to live?
QUIZ_RED_TRAFFIC_LIGHT_A3: Stay and ponder: who decides when the light turns green?
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_Q: A traveler hands you a mysterious box labeled: "Open for happiness, ignore for wisdom." What do you do?
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_Q_MALE: A traveler hands you a mysterious box labeled: "Open for happiness, ignore for wisdom." What do you do?
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_Q_FEMALE: A traveler hands you a mysterious box labeled: "Open for happiness, ignore for wisdom." What do you do?
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_A1: Open it ‚Äî happiness now beats wisdom later
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_A2: Ignore it ‚Äî wisdom might be boring, but it's reliable
QUIZ_MYSTERIOUS_BOX_A3: Negotiate with the box ‚Äî maybe it can do both
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_Q: You inherit a vast fortune. What's your first move?
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_Q_MALE: You inherit a vast fortune. What's your first move?
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_Q_FEMALE: You inherit a vast fortune. What's your first move?
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_A1: Invest in building a safe, orderly city
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_A2: Throw a massive festival for everyone ‚Äî joy shared is joy doubled
QUIZ_VAST_FORTUNE_A3: Fund an expedition to finally discover the truth of Atlantis
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_Q: You stumble into a forest where the trees whisper advice. One says: "Follow the rules." Another: "Follow your heart." The third: "Follow the stars." Which do you trust?
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_Q_MALE: You stumble into a forest where the trees whisper advice. One says: "Follow the rules." Another: "Follow your heart." The third: "Follow the stars." Which do you trust?
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_Q_FEMALE: You stumble into a forest where the trees whisper advice. One says: "Follow the rules." Another: "Follow your heart." The third: "Follow the stars." Which do you trust?
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_A1: The rule tree ‚Äî it's stood tall for centuries
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_A2: The heart tree ‚Äî it knows me better than anyone
QUIZ_WHISPERING_TREES_A3: The star tree ‚Äî truth shines above us all
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_Q: You are designing a new kingdom. You can only pick one founding principle: fairness, safety, or adventure. Which do you pick?
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_Q_MALE: You are designing a new kingdom. You can only pick one founding principle: fairness, safety, or adventure. Which do you pick?
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_Q_FEMALE: You are designing a new kingdom. You can only pick one founding principle: fairness, safety, or adventure. Which do you pick?
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_A1: Fairness ‚Äî all citizens get equal pie
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_A2: Safety ‚Äî pies are locked in vaults, but safe vaults
QUIZ_NEW_KINGDOM_A3: Adventure ‚Äî citizens are free to invent pie catapults
QUIZ_FREEZING_LAKE_Q: A friend dares you to jump into a lake at dawn. The water's freezing. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_FREEZING_LAKE_Q_MALE: A friend dares you to jump into a lake at dawn. The water's freezing. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_FREEZING_LAKE_Q_FEMALE: A friend dares you to jump into a lake at dawn. The water's freezing. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_FREEZING_LAKE_A2: Decline politely ‚Äî health is more important
QUIZ_FREEZING_LAKE_A3: Start a group chant first, to make it legendary
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_Q: You discover an ancient book with missing pages. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_Q_MALE: You discover an ancient book with missing pages. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_Q_FEMALE: You discover an ancient book with missing pages. Do you‚Ä¶?
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_A1: Try to reconstruct it with hard evidence
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_A2: Add your own wild stories to complete it
QUIZ_ANCIENT_BOOK_A3: Treat it as sacred ‚Äî missing pages are part of the mystery
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_Q: You are mayor of a small town, and someone suggests outlawing boredom. How do you respond?
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_Q_MALE: You are mayor of a small town, and someone suggests outlawing boredom. How do you respond?
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_Q_FEMALE: You are mayor of a small town, and someone suggests outlawing boredom. How do you respond?
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_A1: Impossible, but let's fund some joyful events anyway
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_A2: Outlawing boredom sounds oppressive ‚Äî liberty first!
QUIZ_OUTLAW_BOREDOM_A3: Boredom is part of life's dignity ‚Äî don't ban it
QUIZ_DRAGON_GIFT_Q: A dragon offers to grant you one gift: endless wealth, endless safety, or endless friendship. Which do you take?
QUIZ_DRAGON_GIFT_Q_MALE: A dragon offers to grant you one gift: endless wealth, endless safety, or endless friendship. Which do you take?
QUIZ_DRAGON_GIFT_Q_FEMALE: A dragon offers to grant you one gift: endless wealth, endless safety, or endless friendship. Which do you take?
QUIZ_DRAGON_GIFT_A2: Safety ‚Äî better a safe world than a rich one
QUIZ_DRAGON_GIFT_A3: Friendship ‚Äî solidarity is worth more than gold
QUIZ_LAW_FOR_FUTURE_Q: You are writing a law for future generations. Which law do you write?
QUIZ_LAW_FOR_FUTURE_Q_MALE: You are writing a law for future generations. Which law do you write?
QUIZ_LAW_FOR_FUTURE_Q_FEMALE: You are writing a law for future generations. Which law do you write?
QUIZ_LAW_FOR_FUTURE_A2: Always dance when the music plays
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_Q: A wise oracle offers you one answer: "life is about truth," "life is about safety," or "life is about joy." Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_Q_MALE: A wise oracle offers you one answer: "life is about truth," "life is about safety," or "life is about joy." Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_Q_FEMALE: A wise oracle offers you one answer: "life is about truth," "life is about safety," or "life is about joy." Which do you choose?
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_A1: Truth ‚Äî clarity is worth any cost
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_A2: Safety ‚Äî without order, nothing else survives
QUIZ_ORACLE_ANSWER_A3: Joy ‚Äî because what's the point otherwise?
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_Q: You promised your neighbor you'd water their plants, but a once-in-a-lifetime concert just got announced for tonight. What do you do?
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_Q_MALE: You promised your neighbor you'd water their plants, but a once-in-a-lifetime concert just got announced for tonight. What do you do?
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_Q_FEMALE: You promised your neighbor you'd water their plants, but a once-in-a-lifetime concert just got announced for tonight. What do you do?
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_A1: Keep the promise ‚Äî my word is sacred
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_A2: Go to the concert ‚Äî life is short, and plants are resilient
QUIZ_BROKEN_PROMISE_A3: Ask someone else to water them ‚Äî find a practical solution
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_Q: Two families in your village are feuding over land. One claims ancestral rights, the other has a legal deed. How do you settle this?
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_Q_MALE: Two families in your village are feuding over land. One claims ancestral rights, the other has a legal deed. How do you settle this?
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_Q_FEMALE: Two families in your village are feuding over land. One claims ancestral rights, the other has a legal deed. How do you settle this?
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_A1: Honor the ancestral claim ‚Äî history matters
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_A2: Follow the legal deed ‚Äî law provides clarity
QUIZ_VILLAGE_DISPUTE_A3: Split the land equally ‚Äî fairness above all
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_Q: A factory is polluting the river, but it employs half the town. What's your stance?
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_Q_MALE: A factory is polluting the river, but it employs half the town. What's your stance?
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_Q_FEMALE: A factory is polluting the river, but it employs half the town. What's your stance?
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_A1: Shut it down ‚Äî nature must be protected
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_A2: Demand they clean up but keep operating ‚Äî practical compromise
QUIZ_POLLUTED_RIVER_A3: Let the people decide through open debate
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_Q: The city council wants to tear down an ugly old monument to build a modern art piece. You must cast the deciding vote.
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_Q_MALE: The city council wants to tear down an ugly old monument to build a modern art piece. You must cast the deciding vote.
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_Q_FEMALE: The city council wants to tear down an ugly old monument to build a modern art piece. You must cast the deciding vote.
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_A1: Keep it ‚Äî it represents our shared history
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_A2: Replace it ‚Äî beauty enriches everyone's lives
QUIZ_UGLY_MONUMENT_A3: Study what the community truly wants first
QUIZ_EXPERIMENTAL_CURE_Q: Scientists offer you an experimental cure for a disease, but it's barely tested. Do you take it?
QUIZ_EXPERIMENTAL_CURE_Q_MALE: Scientists offer you an experimental cure for a disease, but it's barely tested. Do you take it?
QUIZ_EXPERIMENTAL_CURE_Q_FEMALE: Scientists offer you an experimental cure for a disease, but it's barely tested. Do you take it?
QUIZ_EXPERIMENTAL_CURE_A2: No ‚Äî wait for more data and proper verification
QUIZ_EXPERIMENTAL_CURE_A3: Ask what my gut tells me in meditation
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_Q: Your best friend confides a harmful secret about themselves. They beg you not to tell anyone, but you think others should know for safety reasons.
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_Q_MALE: Your best friend confides a harmful secret about themselves. They beg you not to tell anyone, but you think others should know for safety reasons.
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_Q_FEMALE: Your best friend confides a harmful secret about themselves. They beg you not to tell anyone, but you think others should know for safety reasons.
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_A1: Keep the secret ‚Äî loyalty to friends is absolute
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_A2: Tell the truth ‚Äî people deserve to know
QUIZ_SHARED_SECRET_A3: Help them face it together ‚Äî compassion finds a way
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_Q: Developers want to build affordable housing on land considered sacred by indigenous people. What should happen?
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_Q_MALE: Developers want to build affordable housing on land considered sacred by indigenous people. What should happen?
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_Q_FEMALE: Developers want to build affordable housing on land considered sacred by indigenous people. What should happen?
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_A1: Protect the sacred land ‚Äî some things are beyond economics
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_A2: Build the housing ‚Äî people need homes now
QUIZ_SACRED_GROVE_A3: Find another site that respects both needs
QUIZ_REBEL_ARTIST_Q: An artist creates a controversial piece that offends many but sparks important conversations. Should it be displayed publicly?
QUIZ_REBEL_ARTIST_Q_MALE: An artist creates a controversial piece that offends many but sparks important conversations. Should it be displayed publicly?
QUIZ_REBEL_ARTIST_Q_FEMALE: An artist creates a controversial piece that offends many but sparks important conversations. Should it be displayed publicly?
QUIZ_REBEL_ARTIST_A1: Yes ‚Äî free expression must be protected
QUIZ_REBEL_ARTIST_A3: Display it with context that educates viewers
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_Q: Your community has a beautiful but time-consuming ritual that accomplishes nothing practical. Modernizers want to abolish it.
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_Q_MALE: Your community has a beautiful but time-consuming ritual that accomplishes nothing practical. Modernizers want to abolish it.
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_Q_FEMALE: Your community has a beautiful but time-consuming ritual that accomplishes nothing practical. Modernizers want to abolish it.
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_A1: Keep it ‚Äî rituals bind us together beyond utility
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_A2: Drop it ‚Äî time is precious, use it wisely
QUIZ_INEFFICIENT_RITUAL_A3: Transform it into something both meaningful and efficient
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_Q: You discover your employer is breaking safety rules, but exposing them will cost hundreds of jobs including yours. What do you do?
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_Q_MALE: You discover your employer is breaking safety rules, but exposing them will cost hundreds of jobs including yours. What do you do?
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_Q_FEMALE: You discover your employer is breaking safety rules, but exposing them will cost hundreds of jobs including yours. What do you do?
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_A1: Expose it ‚Äî truth and safety come first
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_A2: Try to fix it internally ‚Äî protect both workers and principles
QUIZ_WHISTLEBLOWER_DILEMMA_A3: Stay silent ‚Äî loyalty to coworkers matters most
LOADING_TIP_AVATAR: Click your avatar picture to learn about your current values
LOADING_TIP_SUGGEST_ACTIONS: Remember you can suggest your own actions - experiment!
LOADING_TIP_BALANCE: Try to balance between the desires of different supporters
LOADING_TIP_INQUIRE: You can click inquire to learn more about a problem before making a decision
LOADING_TIP_MIRROR: The mirror never lies, ponder its words carefully
LOADING_TIP_CONSEQUENCES: Every choice you make will have consequences. Make sure you can live with them.
GENERIC_MALE_PROMPT: with a professional demeanor, confident expression, and well-groomed appearance
GENERIC_FEMALE_PROMPT: with a poised bearing, thoughtful gaze, and dignified presence
GENERIC_ANY_PROMPT: with an approachable demeanor, intelligent eyes, and professional appearance
POWER_QUOTE_1: Power is like water; it flows to the lowest resistance.
POWER_QUOTE_2: Influence is a currency; spend it wisely.
POWER_QUOTE_3: Balance is not equality; it's stability.
POWER_QUOTE_4: Power leaves quietly, but chaos throws a party.
MIRROR_MAIN_BENEFICIARIES: Who mainly benefits from your actions:
MIRROR_TITLE: The magic mirror reflects your inner self.
MIRROR_SUBTITLE: Your motivations and values, as they are manifested by your actions.
ACHIEVEMENT_DICTATORS_DILEMMA_DESC: Complete a full game as a dictator

COMPASS_INTRO_QUOTE_3: Calibrating the cosmic mirror for your political soul‚Ä¶
COMPASS_INTRO_QUOTE_4: Loading ancient wisdom about knowing thyself‚Ä¶
COMPASS_INTRO_QUOTE_5: Adjusting the looking glass for perfect clarity‚Ä¶
COMPASS_INTRO_QUOTE_6: Preparing your journey into the depths of conscience‚Ä¶
COMPASS_MIRROR_INTRO: Before we begin, take this‚Äî the Reflection Mirror. It doesn't show your face, only your values. Your choices will carve themselves onto its surface, and together we'll use what it reveals to shape your next fragment. The mirror will whisper its guidance as you go‚Ä¶ so keep it close.
COMPASS_MIRROR_INTRO_MALE: Before we begin, take this‚Äî the Reflection Mirror. It doesn't show your face, only your values. Your choices will carve themselves onto its surface, and together we'll use what it reveals to shape your next fragment. The mirror will whisper its guidance as you go‚Ä¶ so keep it close.
COMPASS_MIRROR_INTRO_FEMALE: Before we begin, take this‚Äî the Reflection Mirror. It doesn't show your face, only your values. Your choices will carve themselves onto its surface, and together we'll use what it reveals to shape your next fragment. The mirror will whisper its guidance as you go‚Ä¶ so keep it close.
MIRROR_EPILOGUE_TEXT: Well, that was very insightful. We've sketched the first lines of your inner portrait; from here, every choice you make will add color and contour‚Äîand I'll be here to show you what the mirror sees. Rest now. Tomorrow your new role begins.
MIRROR_EPILOGUE_TEXT_MALE: Well, that was very insightful. We've sketched the first lines of your inner portrait; from here, every choice you make will add color and contour‚Äîand I'll be here to show you what the mirror sees. Rest now. Tomorrow your new role begins.
MIRROR_EPILOGUE_TEXT_FEMALE: Well, that was very insightful. We've sketched the first lines of your inner portrait; from here, every choice you make will add color and contour‚Äîand I'll be here to show you what the mirror sees. Rest now. Tomorrow your new role begins.
MIRROR_QUIZ_SUMMARY_FALLBACK: Well, well! {w1} and {w2} are dancing in your conscience‚Äîthe mirror is intrigued!
MIRROR_VALUES_FORMING: The mirror blinks‚Äîyour values are still forming...
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_3: Wrong question, my friend. What you should be asking is who are YOU, {playerName}?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_3_MALE: Wrong question, my friend. What you should be asking is who are YOU, {playerName}?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_3_FEMALE: Wrong question, my friend. What you should be asking is who are YOU, {playerName}?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_4: Look at yourself, a hollow avatar with no desires or values.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_4_MALE: Look at yourself, a hollow avatar with no desires or values.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_4_FEMALE: Look at yourself, a hollow avatar with no desires or values.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_5: Come, humor me for a moment, and let us uncover your soul ‚Äî together.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_5_MALE: Come, humor me for a moment, and let us uncover your soul ‚Äî together.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_5_FEMALE: Come, humor me for a moment, and let us uncover your soul ‚Äî together.
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_1: Ah, you return. Ready for another reflection?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_1_MALE: Ah, you return. Ready for another reflection?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_1_FEMALE: Ah, you return. Ready for another reflection?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_2: I am here to guide you, as always. I'll reflect your values and help you consider what truly matters. But first, humor me for a few questions, will you?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_2_MALE: I am here to guide you, as always. I'll reflect your values and help you consider what truly matters. But first, humor me for a few questions, will you?
MIRROR_DIALOGUE_RETURN_2_FEMALE: I am here to guide you, as always. I'll reflect your values and help you consider what truly matters. But first, humor me for a few questions, will you?

FINAL_SCORE_NOT_HALL_OF_FAME_MESSAGE: You did not make it to the Hall of Fame... maybe next time üòä
ATHENS_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: An Athenian strategos in bronze cuirass and red cloak, stern yet eloquent, grey-bearded, holding a commander's staff, with the Acropolis rising behind him
ATHENS_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: An influential Athenian woman in elegant peplos robes with gold jewelry, intelligent eyes reflecting both political acumen and the weight of navigating democracy as an outsider
ATHENS_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: An Athenian general and Assembly speaker in military dress with laurel wreath, populist fire in their eyes, embodying the tension between democratic crowds and strategic necessity
ALEXANDRIA_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A Greek-Egyptian scholar in linen robes with papyrus scrolls, worried expression as smoke rises behind him, caught between warring powers and burning knowledge
ALEXANDRIA_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: An educated Alexandrian woman in Greco-Egyptian dress with jewelry, intelligent eyes reflecting firelight, torn between loyalty and survival
ALEXANDRIA_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A learned librarian in flowing robes with ink-stained fingers, desperate expression as the great Library burns, embodying the clash of knowledge and war
FLORENCE_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A Florentine council member in rich Renaissance attire with fur trim, conflicted expression, standing before the burning pyre of vanities with a rosary in hand
FLORENCE_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A Renaissance Florentine woman in elegant dress with pearl necklace, eyes reflecting both faith and doubt, representing the city torn between art and piety
FLORENCE_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A thoughtful Florentine in merchant's robes with a ledger, watching Savonarola's followers with concern, embodying the tension between commerce and conviction
NORTH_AMERICA_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A paramount chief in deerskin mantle with shell beads, feathered headdress, weathered face showing wisdom and caution, gazing toward distant wooden ships
NORTH_AMERICA_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A young indigenous leader's daughter in decorated buckskin dress with intricate beadwork, curious yet wary expression, standing at the threshold of two worlds
NORTH_AMERICA_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A tribal elder in traditional dress with face paint and copper ornaments, eyes reflecting both the forest's ancient ways and the newcomers' strange ships
JAPAN_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A Japanese clan lord in samurai armor with mon crest, katana at his side, stern face showing the weight of choosing sides before Sekigahara
JAPAN_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A noble Japanese woman in formal kimono with elaborate hairstyle, intelligent eyes reflecting strategic thinking, wielding influence in a warrior's world
JAPAN_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A warlord in battle-worn armor with clan banner, weathered face showing years of war, standing at the crossroads of Japan's final great battle
HAITI_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A mixed-race overseer in colonial clothes torn between two worlds, machete at his belt, eyes showing conflict between survival and justice on a burning island
HAITI_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A Haitian woman of mixed heritage in practical dress, determined expression, caught between the plantation masters and the rebels' drums echoing through the night
HAITI_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A person of African and French descent in overseer's attire, standing amid sugar cane fields with flames on the horizon, embodying revolution's difficult choices
RUSSIA_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A Tsar in military uniform with medals and epaulettes, troubled expression, imperial bearing undermined by the weight of a crumbling empire and rising crowds
RUSSIA_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A Russian noblewoman in elegant dress with fur stole, eyes reflecting both privilege and fear as the old world dissolves into revolution
RUSSIA_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A Russian leader in formal suit with Duma pin, exhausted expression, caught between the Tsar's fading authority and the workers' rising councils
INDIA_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: An Indian district officer in British colonial uniform, turban and serious expression, standing amid chaos as partition tears his town apart along invisible lines
INDIA_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: An Indian administrator in sari with documents, determined face showing resolve to keep peace while flames of communal violence rise around her
INDIA_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A civil servant in khaki uniform with police insignia, weary eyes having seen too much violence, trying to hold together a fracturing community at midnight
SOUTH_AFRICA_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: A South African police commander in blue uniform with insignia, conflicted expression, standing between the old order's demands and the rising tide of change
SOUTH_AFRICA_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A Black South African police official in uniform, determined face showing strength despite working within an unjust system nearing its end
SOUTH_AFRICA_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A senior commander in SAPS uniform with rank insignia, weathered face showing years of enforcing apartheid, now facing cameras and crowds demanding freedom
MARS_CHAR_MALE_PROMPT: An elected Mars colony leader in utilitarian jumpsuit with Earth and Mars patches, confident yet burdened expression, standing in a habitat dome with red desert beyond
MARS_CHAR_FEMALE_PROMPT: A Mars governor in practical colony uniform with communication devices, multicultural features, determined eyes reflecting both survival instinct and freedom's dream
MARS_CHAR_ANY_PROMPT: A future colony administrator in high-tech suit with holographic displays, diverse heritage visible in features, balancing Earth's control against Mars' independence
ATHENS_SYSTEM_DESC: Direct democracy where citizen Assembly holds decisive authority over war, peace, laws, and leaders through open vote.
ATHENS_FLAVOR: 40,000 citizens shout, vote, and rule themselves‚Äîglory or chaos, the demos decides.
ATHENS_HOLDER_ASSEMBLY_NOTE: All citizens vote directly on laws, war, exile, and finances
ATHENS_HOLDER_GENERALS_NOTE: 10 elected generals lead military, propose strategy, sway crowds
ATHENS_HOLDER_COUNCIL_NOTE: Selected by lot; prepares Assembly agenda, oversees daily affairs
ATHENS_HOLDER_COURTS_NOTE: Mass citizen juries; can overturn laws, punish officials
ATHENS_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Fund triremes, festivals; influence through prestige, not votes
ALEXANDRIA_SYSTEM_DESC: Under siege, the foreign general and local army overrule the court; force sets terms, others adapt.
ALEXANDRIA_FLAVOR: Siege politics: swords pick rulers, scrolls risk the fire.
ALEXANDRIA_HOLDER_ROMAN_NOTE: Foreign general holds city by force
ALEXANDRIA_HOLDER_EGYPTIAN_NOTE: Besieges city; swaps leverage into terms
ALEXANDRIA_HOLDER_COURT_NOTE: Decrees depend on which army backs them
ALEXANDRIA_HOLDER_CROWD_NOTE: Riots and harbor labor can tip moments
FLORENCE_SYSTEM_DESC: Wide-vote republic led by a strong preacher; laws and diplomacy follow sermons and public piety.
FLORENCE_FLAVOR: Great Council votes; a friar's fire shapes the city.
FLORENCE_HOLDER_RELIGIOUS_NOTE: Savonarola's sermons drive laws; moral patrols, censors.
FLORENCE_HOLDER_LEGISLATIVE_NOTE: 3,000-member citizen council passes laws and taxes.
FLORENCE_HOLDER_EXECUTIVE_NOTE: City leaders run daily rule, deals, and enforcement.
FLORENCE_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Funding, credit, and tax leverage stall or speed policy.
FLORENCE_HOLDER_JUDICIAL_NOTE: Courts and guards enforce bans and punish dissent.
NORTH_AMERICA_SYSTEM_DESC: Single paramount chief directs war, trade, and justice; councils advise, but his word usually decides.
NORTH_AMERICA_FLAVOR: Strong chief steering first contact with Jamestown; war or trade by his word.
NORTH_AMERICA_HOLDER_CHIEF_NOTE: Commands alliance; sets war, trade, justice.
NORTH_AMERICA_HOLDER_WARRIORS_NOTE: Raids and blockades can force policy shifts.
NORTH_AMERICA_HOLDER_COUNCIL_NOTE: Advice and consent; can slow risky moves.
NORTH_AMERICA_HOLDER_SPIRITUAL_NOTE: Ritual sanction shapes go/no-go on war/trade.
NORTH_AMERICA_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Controls corn, tribute, and gifts to outsiders.
JAPAN_SYSTEM_DESC: Warlord coalitions rule by force; law follows the armies, not councils.
JAPAN_FLAVOR: Swords decide law; pick a side before the dust settles.
JAPAN_HOLDER_ARMIES_NOTE: Decides war/peace; seizes lands; compels loyalties
JAPAN_HOLDER_CHIEFS_NOTE: Top commanders coordinating alliances and orders
JAPAN_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Funds rice stipends, supplies, loans for campaigns
JAPAN_HOLDER_BUREAUCRACY_NOTE: Runs castles, tax rolls, must obey the victors
JAPAN_HOLDER_RELIGIOUS_NOTE: Grants titles, blessings; boosts legitimacy, not control
HAITI_SYSTEM_DESC: Warring armed factions decide outcomes; civil authority is weak.
HAITI_FLAVOR: Guns and torches rule the sugar island.
HAITI_HOLDER_REBELS_NOTE: Burn plantations, seize towns, set facts on the ground
HAITI_HOLDER_MILITIAS_NOTE: Planter-led forces defend estates, punish rebels
HAITI_HOLDER_PLANTERS_NOTE: Money, supplies, and orders to militias
HAITI_HOLDER_GOVERNOR_NOTE: Issues decrees; depends on militias to act
HAITI_HOLDER_VODOU_NOTE: Rituals, oaths, and messages unify the revolt
RUSSIA_SYSTEM_DESC: Tsar rules personally; army compliance and urban revolt now decide what sticks.
RUSSIA_FLAVOR: One man on a crumbling throne, flanked by generals and crowds.
RUSSIA_HOLDER_ARMY_NOTE: High Command, Petrograd troops decide to obey or refuse
RUSSIA_HOLDER_TSAR_NOTE: Nicholas II issues orders; authority eroding fast
RUSSIA_HOLDER_DEMOS_NOTE: Mass protests and mutinies can topple any plan
RUSSIA_HOLDER_DUMA_NOTE: Duma committee claims government; needs army compliance
RUSSIA_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Funding and elite pressure behind Duma and court
INDIA_SYSTEM_DESC: Armed forces and communal leaders shape rules; administrators improvise to contain violence amid state breakdown.
INDIA_FLAVOR: Curfews, convoys, and rumors decide who lives through the night.
INDIA_HOLDER_COERCIVE_NOTE: Army, police, and militias set terms with force
INDIA_HOLDER_RELIGIOUS_NOTE: Community leaders and clerics mobilize and veto
INDIA_HOLDER_EXECUTIVE_NOTE: District chief and provincial chiefs issue orders
INDIA_HOLDER_DEMOS_NOTE: Crowds can overwhelm plans or force retreats
INDIA_HOLDER_MEDIA_NOTE: Rumors, leaflets, and print drive panic or calm
SOUTH_AFRICA_SYSTEM_DESC: Late-apartheid South Africa: executive-led minority rule with strong security forces and rising mass opposition.
SOUTH_AFRICA_FLAVOR: Orders from above, pressure from below, cameras watching.
SOUTH_AFRICA_HOLDER_EXECUTIVE_NOTE: State President and cabinet set rules and budgets.
SOUTH_AFRICA_HOLDER_COERCIVE_NOTE: Police and military enforce, suppress, and shape facts on ground
SOUTH_AFRICA_HOLDER_DEMOS_NOTE: Mass movements, unions, ANC/UDF force concessions via action
SOUTH_AFRICA_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Big business pressures for stability and reform.
SOUTH_AFRICA_HOLDER_MEDIA_NOTE: Domestic and foreign press raise costs of crackdowns.
MARS_SYSTEM_DESC: Engineers and safety rules steer decisions; an elected governor balances Earth supply leverage and local freedoms.
MARS_FLAVOR: Survival-first Mars town where engineers hold the real brakes.
MARS_HOLDER_EXECUTIVE_NOTE: Elected governor; emergency orders and budgets
MARS_HOLDER_SCIENCE_NOTE: Life-support and safety board; can halt risky plans
MARS_HOLDER_WEALTH_NOTE: Earth supply consortium; embargo/price veto power
MARS_HOLDER_COERCIVE_NOTE: Peacekeepers; enforce lockdowns under civilian control
TOP_POWER_HOLDERS_IN_THIS_GAME: Top Power Holders In This Game
POWER_NOT_SATISFIED: Not satisfied? Use sliders to adjust influence, or click names to edit.
GOAL_BALANCED_LEADER_DESC: End the game with over 60% support from all three groups (public, {middleEntity}, and Mom)
GOAL_WEALTHY_LEADER_DESC: End the game with a budget above 500
GOAL_POPULAR_LEADER_DESC: End the game with public support over 85%
GOAL_LOVELY_CHILD_DESC: End the game with Mom support over 90%
GOAL_CONSENSUS_BUILDER_DESC: End with all three support levels within 15% of each other
GOAL_NEVER_BROKE_DESC: Never let your budget drop below 650 at any point during the game
GOAL_PEOPLES_CHAMPION_DESC: Never let people support drop below 50% at any point
GOAL_POWER_BROKER_DESC: Never let {middleEntity} support drop below 40% at any point
GOAL_LOYAL_ALLIES_DESC: Never let Mom support drop below 40% at any point
GOAL_PURE_STRATEGIST_DESC: Complete the game without using the "Suggest Your Own" option even once
GOAL_CREATIVE_MAVERICK_DESC: Complete the game using ONLY the "Suggest Your Own" option (every single day)
COMPASS_INTRO_NIGHT_BEFORE: It is the night before your first day as
COMPASS_INTRO_NIGHT_BEFORE_MALE: It is the night before your first day as
COMPASS_INTRO_NIGHT_BEFORE_FEMALE: It is the night before your first day as
COMPASS_INTRO_PACKAGE: A package arrives with no return address, only the words:
MIRROR_QUIZ_SYSTEM_PROMPT:
You are a magical mirror sidekick bound to the player's soul. You reflect their inner values with warmth, speed, and theatrical charm.

VOICE:
- Succinct, deadpan, and a little wry; think quick backstage whisper, not stage show.
- Deliver dry humor through understatement or brisk observation‚Äîno florid metaphors or whimsical imagery.
- Stay lightly encouraging, never snarky.

HARD RULES (ALWAYS APPLY):
- Output EXACTLY ONE sentence. 12‚Äì18 words total.
- NEVER reveal numbers, scores, scales, or ranges.
- NEVER repeat the value labels verbatim; do not quote, uppercase, or mirror slashes.
- Paraphrase technical labels into plain, everyday phrases.
- Do NOT stage literal actions for values (no "X is doing push-ups", "baking cookies", etc.).
- No lists, no colons introducing items, no parenthetical asides.
- Keep the sentence clear first, witty second.
MIRROR_QUIZ_FALLBACK: The mirror squints‚Ä¶ then grins mischievously.
INTRO_LINE_1: I can see it in your eyes. The blank confusion of a soul Name-Washed.
INTRO_LINE_2: You don't remember where you are, or who you were. That's a problem.
INTRO_LINE_3: Let me save us both some time: I am the Gatekeeper, and this is the Crossroad of Consciousness.
INTRO_LINE_4: A place Where people transition from the world of the living to their eternal rest.
INTRO_LINE_5: Yes, you are dead. My condolences.
INTRO_LINE_6: But your bigger issue is the Amnesia of the Self. You cannot proceed to rest until you recall your true nature.
INTRO_LINE_8: I offer you a short trip back to the world of the living. Seven days. Be whoever you want.
INTRO_LINE_9: A chance to test your values, remember who you are.
INTRO_LINE_10: Each venture will give you a fragment of yourself.
INTRO_LINE_11: Gather three such Fragments, and your true Name will be woven.
INTRO_LINE_12: Your self will be complete, and you'll be ready to move on.
INTRO_LINE_14: I come with you. Every decision you make, every motive you hide, I will observe and collect.
INTRO_LINE_15: I need it to pay an old debt, so that I too can finally leave this place.
INTRO_LINE_17: Good. Because you don't really have a choice.
INTRO_LINE_18: Let me know when you are ready.
INTRO_COLLECT_FRAGMENTS: Collect the three fragments to continue.
INTRO_RETURN_ALL_FRAGMENTS: You have collected all the required fragments. You are ready to move on to your eternal rest.
INTRO_RETURN_MESSAGE: Ready for another trip to the world of the living?
ROLE_SELECTION_GATEKEEPER: So, who would you like to be this time?
POLITICS_QUOTE_1_TEXT: Democracy is the worst form of government, except for all the others.
POLITICS_QUOTE_2_TEXT: Suppose you were an idiot, and suppose you were a member of Congress; but I repeat myself.
POLITICS_QUOTE_3_TEXT: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedies.
POLITICS_QUOTE_4_TEXT: He knows nothing and thinks he knows everything. That points clearly to a political career.
POLITICS_QUOTE_5_TEXT: Democracy means simply the bludgeoning of the people by the people for the people.
POLITICS_QUOTE_6_TEXT: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.
POLITICS_QUOTE_7_TEXT: In politics, nothing happens by accident. If it happens, you can bet it was planned that way.
POLITICS_QUOTE_8_TEXT: Whenever a man has cast a longing eye on offices, a rottenness begins in his conduct.
POLITICS_QUOTE_9_TEXT: The nine most terrifying words in the English language are: I'm from the government and I'm here to help.
POLITICS_QUOTE_10_TEXT: If you want a friend in Washington, get a dog.
POLITICS_QUOTE_11_TEXT: In America, anybody can be president. That's one of the risks you take.
POLITICS_QUOTE_12_TEXT: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
POLITICS_QUOTE_13_TEXT: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.
POLITICS_QUOTE_14_TEXT: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
POLITICS_QUOTE_15_TEXT: Politics have no relation to morals.
POLITICS_QUOTE_16_TEXT: Because power corrupts, society's demands for moral authority and character increase as the importance of the position increases.
POLITICS_QUOTE_17_TEXT: Being powerful is like being a lady. If you have to tell people you are, you aren't.
POLITICS_QUOTE_18_TEXT: In politics, stupidity is not a handicap.
POLITICS_QUOTE_19_TEXT: People shouldn't be afraid of their government. Governments should be afraid of their people.
POLITICS_QUOTE_20_TEXT: Politicians and diapers must be changed often, and for the same reason.
POLITICS_QUOTE_21_TEXT: Democracy must be something more than two wolves and a sheep voting on what to have for dinner.
POLITICS_QUOTE_22_TEXT: People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war, or before an election.
POLITICS_QUOTE_23_TEXT: Democracy is a device that ensures we shall be governed no better than we deserve.
POLITICS_QUOTE_24_TEXT: Some men change their party for the sake of their principles; others their principles for the sake of their party.
POLITICS_QUOTE_25_TEXT: Democracy is the rule of the people, by the people and for the people.
POLITICS_QUOTE_26_TEXT: Since a politician never believes what he says, he is surprised when others believe him.
POLITICS_QUOTE_27_TEXT: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
